sessions.title: Opening
sessions.titleJa: オープニング
sessions.outline: The Mercari Group is working to utilize technology in more ways than ever before. Mercari CPO Yuki Hamada will discuss the thoughts and efforts behind this objective.
sessions.outlineJa: メルカリグループは、今後、これまで以上にテクノロジー活用を進めてまいります。その取り組みの方針や思いをCPOの濱田 優貴からお話いたします。

speakers.name: Yuki Hamada
speakers.profile: Yuki Hamada founded CYBRiDGE GROUP CORPORATION, where he took on the role of Executive Vice President, while enrolled in the Tokyo University of Science, Faculty of Engineering. After leaving CYBRiDGE in October 2014, Hamada joined Mercari, Inc. He became a board member in March 2016.
speakers.profileJa: 東京理科大学工学部在学中に株式会社サイブリッジを創業、取締役副社長に就任する。2014年10月に同社退社後、株式会社メルカリ入社。2016年3月に取締役に就任する。

sessions.title: Keynote
sessions.titleJa: 基調講演
sessions.outline: Mercari JP CTO Suguru Namura, Mercari US CTO Mok Oh, and Merpay Director Keisuke Sogawa will discuss the events that have occurred at their respective companies in the past year. They will also talk about the goals and technical challenges that they plan to tackle in the future.
sessions.outlineJa: 株式会社メルカリCTO 名村 卓、株式会社メルペイ取締役 曾川景介、Mercari, Inc. CTO Dr. Mok Ohの3名から、各社でここ1年間に起こったこと、これから目指す方向、技術的な取り組みについてご紹介します。

speakers.name: Suguru Namura
speakers.profile: Suguru Namura is the Chief Technology Officer of JP Mercari. After working as a contract developer, he joined CyberAgent in 2004, where he was in charge of developing various new business projects related to media and online video games. He joined Mercari in 2016, and transferred to the US to develop Mercari’s US service. In April 2017, he became JP Mercari’s CTO.
speakers.profileJa: 受託開発経験を経て、2004年株式会社サイバーエージェント入社。各種メディアやゲームなどの新規事業立ち上げの開発を担当。2016年に株式会社メルカリ入社。USに出向し、USのサービス開発を担当。2017年4月CTO就任。

speakers.name: Dr. Mok Oh
speakers.profile: Dr. Mok Oh is the Chief Technology Officer of US Mercari. He has been in the tech industry for over 20 years with wide- and deep-ranging experiences – from initial research to execution, from startups to large enterprises.Previously, he was the Corporate Vice President at Samsung Electronics in Suwon, Korea; Chief Scientist at PayPal; Cofounder and CEO of Moju Labs; Entrepreneur in Residence at North Bridge Venture Capital; CIO at Where, Inc; and Founder of EveryScape. Mok holds 12 patents, a Ph.D. from MIT, an M.S. from University of Pennsylvania, and two BA degrees (Computer Science and Art History) from Oberlin College.
speakers.profileJa: Mok Oh氏（博士）はメルカリUSのCTOです。彼は、テック業界で20年を超える経験があり、初期研究から実行まで、スタートアップから大企業まで、幅広く、そして深い経験があります。EveryScape創設者、Where, Inc. CIO、ノースブリッジベンチャーキャピタル客員起業家、Moju Labs共同創設者兼CEO、PayPalチーフサイエンティスト、サムスン電子副社長（韓国、スウォン）を歴任。Mok氏はオバーリン大学で学士、ペンシルベニア大学で修士、そしてマサチューセッツ工科大学で博士号を取得し、12の特許保持者でもあります。

speakers.name: Keisuke Sogawa
speakers.profile: Keisuke Sogawa is a Director of Merpay. He was selected as part of the MITOU Youth program in 2010. In 2011, he completed his studies at the Graduate School of Informatics at Kyoto University, and went on to launch WebPay at FluxFlex in Silicon Valley. As the Chief Technology Officer of WebPay, he developed the service infrastructure for credit card payment services.  He also worked on the LINE Pay business as part of the LINE Group. He has been at his current position at Merpay since November 2017.
speakers.profileJa: 2010年度未踏ユース採択。2011年京都大学情報学研究科修了。2011年にシリコンバレーの FluxFlex社にてWebPayを立ち上げる。ウェブペイ株式会社の最高技術責任者（CTO）としてクレジットカード決済のサービス基盤の開発に従事、LINEグループに参画しLINE Pay事業を経験。2017年11月、株式会社メルペイ取締役に就任。

sessions.title: Microservices Platform at Mercari
sessions.titleJa: Microservices Platform at Mercari
sessions.outline: As Mercari continues to grow as a service and organization, we decided it was time to make the move from a monolith architecture to microservices. The Microservices Platform Team is the team responsible for building the platform for this. The goal is to create a platform that allows developers to maximize their productivity for a rapid service development cycle where teams are independent and have ownership over their projects. In this session, Nakashima will introduce the initiatives the Microservices Platform Team are taking to achieve this goal.
sessions.outlineJa: Mercariではサービスと組織の拡大に合わせてMonolithアーキテクチャからMicroservicesアーキテクチャへの移行を進めています．Microservices Platform TeamはこのMicroservicesのためのPlatformの構築を行っています．開発者のDeveloper Productivityを最大限に高め各チームがオーナーシップを持ち独立して高速にサービス開発サイクルを回せるようなPlatformを目指しています．本セッションではMicroservices Platform Teamの取り組みを紹介します

speakers.name: Taichi Nakashima
speakers.profile: Taichi Nakashima (@deeeet) is a tech lead for the Microservices Platform at Mercari. Prior to Mercari, he was a software engineer at Japanese E-commerce company, working on building internal Platform-as-a-Service. He is Gopher and co-authoer of “みんなのGo言語” (Japanese Golang book).
speakers.profileJa: Taichi Nakashima (@deeeet) is a tech lead for the Microservices Platform at Mercari. Prior to Mercari, he was a software engineer at Japanese E-commerce company, working on building internal Platform-as-a-Service. He is Gopher and co-authoer of “みんなのGo言語” (Japanese Golang book).

sessions.title: Introduction to the Corporate Solutions Engineering
sessions.titleJa: Introduction to the Corporate Solutions Engineering
sessions.outline: Mercari has a Corporate Solutions Engineering Team for solving the challenges faced in managing the company. In this session, Karasawa will introduce the activities of his team, the kinds of challenges they are trying to resolve, how they go about developing products to overcome these challenges, and the fundamental philosophy behind what they do.
sessions.outlineJa: メルカリには「経営課題を解決する」ための Corporate Solutions Engineering というチームがあります。このチームがどのような活動を通じてどのような課題を解決しているのか、また、そこでどのようなプロダクトを開発しているのか、その基礎となる考え方と活動についてご紹介します。

speakers.name: Sotaro Karasawa
speakers.profile: Sotaro Karasawa joined GREE, Inc. after graduating from the graduate school of Chuo University in 2010. In February 2011, he co-founded Crocos, Inc., taking on the role of CTO. In August 2012, Crocos Inc. was bought by Yahoo Japan Corporation. He was responsible for the further development of Crocos as part of the Yahoo Group, and the expansion of social platforms within Yahoo itself. In May 2015, he joined Mercari, where he took on the roles of CTO and VPoE before arriving in his current position as manager of the Corporate Solutions Engineering (CSE) Team.
speakers.profileJa: 2010年中央大学大学院卒業後、グリー株式会社入社。2011年2月株式会社クロコスを共同創業、CTO就任。2012年8月、クロコスをヤフー株式会社へ売却。ヤフーのグループ会社としてクロコスの事業成長と、ヤフー自身のソーシャルの展開を担当。2015年5月、株式会社メルカリに参画。CTO、VPoEを経て、現在は Corporate Solutions Engineering (CSE) マネージャー。

sessions.title: Mercari API: from Monolithic to Microservices
sessions.titleJa: Mercari API: from Monolithic to Microservices
sessions.outline: Mercari has evolved tremendously in the last 5 years, and so is our code base. As of 2018, the backend API is a monolithic repository of half-million lines of code, serving all the functions of the Mercari web and mobile applications. It is becoming a bottle neck of our growth, in terms of both the system and the organization. This talk will focus on how we migrate the monolithic backend API to a microservice architecture, the methodology we choose and the lessons we learned.

Prior to Mercari, he was a tech lead of Indeed, working on different components of the job search engine including Title Normalization, Location system, Job Search API, etc.

sessions.title: Mercari ML Platform
sessions.titleJa: Mercari ML Platform
sessions.outline: Mercari uses several machine learning (ML) models. After an ML model is created, it requires continuous tuning and retraining. This is why it's not possible to use multiple ML models without having a highly automated system in place. In this session, I will be talking about the fundamentals of such automation and systems, what we’re currently using, and what we're developing.
sessions.outlineJa: メルカリでは多数の機械学習モデル(以下MLモデル)を運用しています。MLモデルは構築後も継続的な評価・再トレーニング・チューニングが必要で、高度に自動化された仕組み無しでは多数のMLモデルを運用できません。本セッションではそれらの基盤と自動化の仕組み等、現状と開発中の物について話します。

sessions.title: Why Are We Trying to Turn Payment Processing Into a Microservice?
sessions.titleJa: どうして僕らは決済処理をマイクロサービス化しようとしているのか
sessions.outline:
Merpay will provide users with the means to use their Mercari sales balance as a form of electronic money. This feature will of course be available for shopping on Mercari itself, but in order to do that, we have to face the issue of processing payments over Mercari. A monolithic program that has been built up over years now finds itself confronted with the challenge of implementing a new method of payment. To resolve this, we are taking a Go Bold approach of moving to microservices, but many difficulties lie within. In this session, Saito will talk about:
1) Why we decided to make the move to microservices
2) Deciphering the control flow of complex intertwined switch statements 
3) The battle with potential errors caused by distributed transactions 
4) How to reduce the effect on accounting systems
sessions.outlineJa: メルカリの売上金も電子マネーとして使えるようになるメルペイ。もちろんメルカリでの買い物でも使える予定ですが、そこで問題となったのがメルカリ上での決済処理。増築に増築を重ねたモノリシックなプログラムが、新しい決済手段の導入の前に立ちはだかります。そこで、私達はGO BOLDにMicroservice化で解決しようとしていますが、その中で認められた問題点と解決策を示していきます。0) なぜMicroservices化に踏み切ったのか1) 複雑に絡み合ったswitch文となった業務フローを読み解く2) 分散トランザクションで発生するであろうエラーとの戦い3) 会計システムへの影響をいかに減らすか

speakers.name: Yuichiro Saito
speakers.profile: Yuichiro Saito was born in Osaka in 1981. He majored in business system science at the Tsukuba University Graduate School of Business Sciences and completed the first semester of the doctoral program. He then joined a large system integration company as a programmer, before going on to work at various web service companies as a software engineer and product manager. At Mercari, he worked as a backend software engineer responsible for developing listing, payment, delivery, and anti-fraud features, before moving to his current position at Merpay as a payment system developer. He has published such works as The Web App Engineer Training Guide (co-author, Gijutsu-Hyohron Co., Ltd., 2014), and IT Infrastructure Monitoring (Practical) Guide for Beginners (sole author, Gijutsu-Hyohron Co., Ltd., 2016).
speakers.profileJa: 1981年、大阪府生まれ。筑波大学大学院 ビジネス科学研究科 経営システム科学専攻 博士前期課程修了。大手SIerでプログラマを担当し、その後各種Webサービス運営会社でソフトウェアエンジニア・プロダクトマネジャを歴任。メルカリではバックエンドソフトウェアエンジニアとして、US、JPプロダクトの出品・決済・配送・不正対策の開発担当者を経て、現在、メルペイの決済システム開発担当者として従事。著書に「Webアプリエンジニア養成読本」(共著, 技術評論社, 2014年)と「ITインフラ監視[実践]入門」(単著, 技術評論社, 2016年)がある。

sessions.title: Implementing TypeErasure in ViewController
sessions.titleJa: ViewControllerのTypeErasureを実装する
sessions.outline: To develop our app, we use MicroViewController, which we introduced at iOSDC, and we have also implemented the idea of MicroFrameworks. A common issue with using MicroFrameworks is circular dependencies, but by using the MicroViewController model, we can implement TypeErasure for ViewController.  We call this ViewControllerRequest. Today I will talk about ViewControllerRequest, our prized service that solved the problem of circular dependencies and greatly reduced the work required for refactoring.
sessions.outlineJa: 我々はiOSDCで発表したMicroViewControllerに加えてMicroFrameworksの考え方も導入してアプリケーションを開発しています。MicroFrameworksに付き物なのが循環依存の問題ですが、MicroViewControllerの型を導入することで、「ViewControllerに対してTypeErasureを実装する」ことが可能になりました。我々はこれをViewControllerRequestと名付けて利用しています。循環依存の問題を解決し、更にはリファクタリングの工数を大幅に縮めた虎の子「ViewControllerRequest」について、お話しします。

sessions.title: Communication Technologies in the Age of Quantum Information: The Quantum Internet
sessions.titleJa: 量子情報時代の通信技術：量子インターネット
sessions.outline: In this session, Nagayama will discuss telecommunications in the age of quantum information. The quantum internet operates on a different principle—quantum mechanics—from the internet we have today, on the foundation of entanglement created between two random nodes. Naturally, the quantum internet comes with different advantages. For example, it is the foundation for realizing completely secure cryptography. Furthermore, quantum computers utilize entanglement and superposition to simultaneously handle a mass of states. Due to this feature, quantum memory size is crucial. By connecting quantum computers via telecommunications to conduct distributed quantum computing, we can obtain a higher computing ability. Entanglement is the fundamental physical attribute of quantum mechanics, and therefore is also useful for a variety of scientific experiments. Nagayama will also touch on the current progress of research and development of the quantum internet. We hope this session will give you a chance to think a bit about the future of telecommunications.
sessions.outlineJa: 量子情報時代の通信について概説する。量子インターネットは今のインターネットとは異なる原理（量子力学）で動き、任意の2ノード間にエンタングルメントを生成する基盤である。当然、利点も異なる。例えば、「完全に安全な暗号通信」を実現するための基盤となる。また、量子コンピュータは、エンタングルメントと重ね合わせを用いて大量の状態を同時に扱う。この特性上、量子メモリサイズが重要である。量子コンピュータ同士を通信で繋げて分散量子計算を行うことで、より大きな計算力を得られる。また、エンタングルメントは量子力学の基本的な物理特性なので、様々な科学実験にも役立つ。この他、現在の量子インターネットの研究開発状況についても触れる。このセッションを通して、将来の通信の姿に少しでも想いを馳せてもらえたら幸いである。

speakers.name: Shota Nagayama
speakers.profile: Doctor of policy and media, Shota Nagayama conducted a diverse range of research on quantum error correcting code and quantum computer architecture at the Keio University Jun Murai Laboratory. However, a fascination with the internet led him to quantum internet architecture. After experiencing a different field through an overseas postbaccalaureate in machine learning, Nagayama joined Mercari in April 2018, working in quantum internet resource management.
speakers.profileJa: 博士（政策・メディア）。慶應義塾大学村井純研究室で多様性を謳って量子エラー訂正符号および量子コンピュータアーキテクチャの研究に取り組んでいたものの、結局インターネットの面白さにやられて量子インターネットアーキテクチャへ。機械学習でポスドク留学し異分野を経験した後、2018年4月より株式会社メルカリで量子インターネットのリソースマネジメント研究に従事。

sessions.title: Web Application as a Microservice
sessions.titleJa: Web Application as a Microservice
sessions.outline: Mercari Web was developed to support Mercari’s growth, and it has grown in tandem with Mercari for approximately two years. The Japan Web Re-architecture Team was created to improve Mercari Web by staying on top of the constantly evolving web-related technology and preparing for a growing frontend team. In this talk, Sugiura will talk about the details of the new architecture the Web Re-architecture Team is implementing, and what’s in store for Mercari Web after the new architecture is in place.
sessions.outlineJa: メルカリWebはメルカリの成長を支える一角として開発され、約2年間メルカリと共に成長してきました。このメルカリWebをWebにまつわる技術の進化や拡大するフロントエンドチームといった変化に強くするためにJP Web Rearchitectチームが誕生しました。このトークではJP Web Rearchitectで実現する新たなアーキテクチャとその詳細、そしてそれを実現した先にある未来についてお話します。

speakers.name: Sota Sugiura
speakers.profile: Sota Sugiura joined Mercari in January 2017. For his first three months, he belonged to the US team in Tokyo and contributed to the US application’s growth. In April 2017, he moved from Mercari US to Mercari JP, where he helped plan Mercari Channel, which was released last July, from the initial stages. As a backend engineer, he is involved in development. In July of this year, he moved to the Web Re-architecture Team. He spends his days fulfilling his dream of developing as a JavaScript engineer.
speakers.profileJa: 2017年1月入社。最初の3ヶ月間はUSチームに所属し、USメルカリの成長に尽力。2017年4月よりJPチームに異動し、昨年7月にリリースされたメルカリチャンネルのチームに立ち上げ当初から参画。Backendエンジニアとして開発を行う。今年の7月よりWebのRearchitectチームに異動。念願のJavaScriptエンジニアとして日々開発中。

sessions.title: Shifting Security to the Left the Right Way
sessions.titleJa: Shifting Security to the Left the Right Way
sessions.outline: As software development evolves, it is vital to shifting security “to the left” earlier in the software development life cycle (SDLC) to make application security move faster with lower cost. This session will discuss on why application security needs to shift left and how to build a modern security engineering organization with a shift-left approach.
sessions.outlineJa: As software development evolves, it is vital to shifting security “to the left” earlier in the software development life cycle (SDLC) to make application security move faster with lower cost. This session will discuss on why application security needs to shift left and how to build a modern security engineering organization with a shift-left approach.

speakers.name: Yannarak Wannasai
speakers.profile: Yannarak Wannasai is a subject-matter expert in application security at Mercari, Inc. He has 13 years of extensive experience in IT Industry, focused on Secure Software Development Lifecycle (SSDLC). He spoke at some security events, including OWASP, CSA, and APKIC.
speakers.profileJa: Yannarak Wannasai is a subject-matter expert in application security at Mercari, Inc. He has 13 years of extensive experience in IT Industry, focused on Secure Software Development Lifecycle (SSDLC). He spoke at some security events, including OWASP, CSA, and APKIC.

sessions.title: Leveraging billions of data items and machine learning to map the future
sessions.titleJa: 数十億規模のデータと機械学習で描く未来
sessions.outline: With over one billion total listings on the Mercari app to date and with the remarkable advancements observed in recent years in the fields of machine learning and deep learning, there is increasingly greater focus on, and expectations for, data utility. There are a number of projects underway which utilize data on items and user behavior, and several features, including image recognition for listings and automatic detection of fraudulent listings, are already in operation on the service. This session will introduce those algorithms and execution platforms and will also introduce a number of features currently in development.
sessions.outlineJa: 累計出品数が10億品を超え、近年の機械学習・ディープラーニング分野の目覚ましい発展と相まって、データ活用への注目と期待がますます高まっている。多様な商品データや行動データを利用した複数のプロジェクトが進行しており、出品時の画像認識や、不正の自動検知といった機能がすでにサービス内で稼働している。本セッションでは、それらのアルゴリズムと実行基盤の紹介、および、一部の開発中の機能について述べる。

speakers.name: Takuma Yamaguchi
speakers.profile: Takuma Yamaguchi has been involved in research on pattern recognition and machine learning since he was a student and has a PhD in engineering. In addition to his research on image recognition, computer vision, and voice recognition, he has also led a research project on algorithms for the calculation of train fares using operations research. After working at a company that developed social games, where he was responsible for the development and operation of their data analysis platform, he joined Mercari in 2016. At Mercari, he is responsible for image-focused machine learning, and has developed an image recognition feature that can be used when listing items on the app.
speakers.profileJa: 学生時代より、パターン認識・機械学習の研究に従事。博士(工学)。画像認識、コンピュータビジョン、音声認識などの研究をはじめ、オペレーションズリサーチ手法に基づく鉄道運賃計算アルゴリズム研究なども担当。ソーシャルゲーム会社でのデータ分析基盤の開発・運用を経て、2016年より株式会社メルカリで画像系を中心とした機械学習分野を担当し、出品時の画像認識機能などを開発。

sessions.title: CSAT Score Super Improvements - Just Do It
sessions.titleJa: CSAT Score - 極度改善(しなさい) -
sessions.outline: One year ago, we started conducting CSAT (Customer Satisfaction) Surveys to measure the satisfaction rate of our users for the US version of Mercari. This scoring system has undergone a series of discussions across our offices in San Francisco (now Palo Alto), Portland, and Tokyo. Now, it’s grown to the point of being included in our company OKR, and we consider it an indispensable metric. In this session, I'll be talking about how the implementation of this metric evolved in the last 12 months, and how it has affected decision-making in our product development.
sessions.outlineJa: US版メルカリでは、一年前からお客様のカスタマーサポート満足度を計測するために、CSAT(Customer Satisfaction) Surveyを実施してスコアを算出しはじめました。このスコアリングは、サンフランシスコ(現パロアルト)/ポートランド/東京の3拠点で議論を重ねて育て続けられ、今ではCompany OKRへ組み込まれるようになり、社内で大切にしているモノサシへと進化しました。そんな私たちのモノサシが、この一年でどのように実装内容が変化していったか、プロダクト開発の意思決定に影響を与えていったかご紹介いたします。

speakers.name: Takako Ohshima
speakers.profile: Takako Ohshima gained extensive technical experience through the Security Camp and the MITOU program organized by the Information-technology Promotion Agency (IPA) during her time as a student, then joined CyberAgent, Inc. after graduating. In the same year, she transferred to the US to work on multiple ad tech products. In 2014, she won 1st place in a US-wide IoT hackathon. In February 2017, Ohshima joined Mercari, Inc. in the US, where she was responsible for developing various in-house tools with the CXI Team. In May of this year, she joined the newly-formed Machine Learning team, where she is improving the data pipeline for the US app.
speakers.profileJa: セキュリティ・キャンプ/未踏ソフトウェア創造事業で技術に濃い学生時代を過ごし、2012年に株式会社サイバーエージェント新卒入社。同年、渡米して複数のアドテクプロダクト開発に従事する。2014年にIoTで米国最大級のハッカソンで全米優勝。2017年2月にUSのMercari,Inc.へ入社し、CXIチームでCS Toolをはじめとするツール周りの開発を担当。今年5月よりUSで新設されたMachine Learningチームへ参加し、現在はUSプロダクトのデータパイプラインの向上に注力している。

sessions.title: Mercari's Search Service: Now and the Future
sessions.titleJa: メルカリにおける検索サービスの現在と未来
sessions.outline: The Search Team develops and improves on features for the Mercari app such as suggestions, related words, and the recommendations tab. In this session, Sugiki will introduce the various features they are developing in their goal to compete on the global stage.
sessions.outlineJa: 検索チームでは、昨年からサジェスト・関連ワード・おすすめタブなど、検索機能を開発・改善してきました。世界を目指すチームの紹介と具体的な各機能の開発についてご紹介します。

speakers.name: Kenji Sugiki
speakers.profile: Kenji Sugiki has 8 years of experience in both large companies and startups working on data science and the development of services that make use of large-scale data processing and machine learning. He joined Mercari in 2017 and is responsible for backend engineering including search, recommendations, and API implementation. During his time in university, he carried out research into natural language processing and information retrieval. He has a PhD in information science.
speakers.profileJa: 2010年よりWeb系大企業やスタートアップで、大規模データ処理・機械学習を活用したサービス開発やデータサイエンス業務に従事。2017年より株式会社メルカリに入社し、サーチ・レコメンド・API実装などバックエンド全般の業務を担当。大学時代は、自然言語処理・情報検索に関する研究に従事。博士（情報科学）。

speakers.name: Yanpeng Lin
speakers.profile: Majored computing science at Kobe University, Graduate school of informatics. Joined Rakuten from 2013 to 2015 focused on Rakuten ICHIBA ranking system development. After that, joined MonotaRO as a machine learning engineer committed on improving search quality and recommender systems. Now at Mercari,  scratching search LtR system and models.
speakers.profileJa: Majored computing science at Kobe University, Graduate school of informatics. Joined Rakuten from 2013 to 2015 focused on Rakuten ICHIBA ranking system development. After that, joined MonotaRO as a machine learning engineer committed on improving search quality and recommender systems. Now at Mercari,  scratching search LtR system and models.

sessions.title: Developing Across the Pacific: The Role of Tech Lead in an International Team
sessions.titleJa: 海をまたぐ開発チームとTech Lead
sessions.outline: Starting this year, every platform team at Mercari, regularly draws up a technical roadmap, and looks at the initiatives they can take to contribute to our products from a technological perspective. The Android Team for Mercari US drew up a technical roadmap focused on the goal of creating a highly mobile and elastic team. In this session, Imai will discuss how the team formulated and pushed forward with this roadmap and his role in the process as a Tech Lead.
sessions.outlineJa: メルカリでは今年からプラットフォームごとに技術ロードマップを策定し、技術的な観点からもプロダクトへ貢献できるような取り組みをしています。US版Mercari Androidチームはスケールしても機動力の高いしなやかなチームを作ることを目指し、技術ロードマップを策定しました。本セッションではどのように技術ロードマップが策定され推進されてきたのかをテックリードの役割も交えてお話します。

speakers.name: Tomoaki Imai
speakers.profile: Tomoaki Imai joined Mercari in 2014. In 2016, he moved to the US where he works on development for the Mercari US product. He loves curry and running.
speakers.profileJa: 2014年にメルカリにジョイン。2016年からUSに移り住み、US版メルカリのプロダクト開発を行っている。カレーとランニングが大好き。

sessions.title: High-Performance Android - US App: Evolution
sessions.titleJa: High 意識 Android - US App : Evolution
sessions.outline: 2018 was a year of big changes for the Mercari US Android team. In 2017, the team had only three members spanning the Tokyo and San Francisco offices and was small but efficient; in 2018, the team has doubled in size. As a result, the team has moved from a Public Security Section 9 model, where the strengths of each individual were the focus, to a stage where they are aiming for different strengths across the teams in each country. In this session, the Mercari US team will talk about their unique choice of technologies and approach to teamwork across the Tokyo and Palo Alto offices in their effort to maintain a high level of performance while faced with the challenges of distance and time differences.
sessions.outlineJa: 2018年、US Androidチームは大きな変革を遂げました。2017年はTokyo & San Francisco 合わせて3人体制という極少数精鋭チームで走り切りましたが、2018年、ついにメンバーの数が倍になりました。これにより、個々人の能力に重点を置いていた「公安9課モデル」から、チーム x チーム で更なる高みを目指すステージに移ったのです。時差や距離といった制約の中でより高いパフォーマンスを追求し続けながら、Tokyo & Palo Altoの2拠点で開発を進めるMercari USチームならではの技術選定とチームワークについて、お時間の許す限り紹介します。

speakers.name: Atsuko Fukui
speakers.profile: Atsuko Fukui is an Android engineer. She joined Mercari in March 2018 with experience in embedded Android development and web service development. Currently, she works on development for the Mercari US product. She likes beer and Kotlin.
speakers.profileJa: Androidエンジニア。Android組み込み開発、Webサービス開発の経験を経て2018年3月メルカリにジョイン。現在はUS向けのプロダクト開発に従事。ビールとKotlinが好きです。

speakers.name: Matthew Vern
speakers.profile: Matthew is an Android Engineer working on the Mercari US product.
speakers.profileJa: Matthew is an Android Engineer working on the Mercari US product.

exhibitions.titleJa: メルカリにおける量子アニーリングの研究
exhibitions.title: Potential Applications of Quantum Annealing at Mercari
exhibitions.descriptionJa: メルカリは今年に入ってからD-Waveの研究をはじめました。 今回はその研究の一部のご紹介およびD-Waveの動き方を体験できるデモンストレーションををご用意させていただきます。
exhibitions.description: In 2018, Mercari began carrying out research into D-Wave. Learn about our research and experience how D-Wave works through our demonstration.

exhibitions.titleJa: 経営課題をエンジニアリングで解決、Corporate Solutions Engineering の取り組み
exhibitions.title: Solving Business Challenges with Engineering: Mercari’s Corporate Solutions Engineering Team
exhibitions.descriptionJa: 昨年末にスタートしたCorporate Solutions Engineeringのここまでの動きとこれからについてご紹介します。人事データベース Teams と評価システム Reviewsのデモも行います。
exhibitions.description: Learn about the activities and future plans of the Corporate Solutions Engineering Team formed last year. There will also be a demo of our HR database 'Teams' and evaluation system 'Reviews'.

exhibitions.titleJa: エキスパートチームの取り組み（Gopher道場、Go Fridayなど）
exhibitions.title: Initiatives by the Expert Team (Gopher Dojo, Go Friday, etc.)
exhibitions.descriptionJa: Gopher道場やGo Fridayなど、メルペイのエキスパートチームが日頃取り組んでいる社内外での活動についてご紹介いたします。また、実際に体験できるコンテンツもご用意しておりますのでお楽しみに！
exhibitions.description: Learn more about our Gopher Dojo, Go Friday, and the activities of the Merpay Expert Team. A hands on experience with plenty of demos to enjoy!

exhibitions.title: MTC App by Flutter
exhibitions.descriptionJa: Flutterで作ったカンファレンスアプリ（iOS/Android）の内側をご紹介します。
exhibitions.description: Learn about the inner workings of the app (iOS/Android) we made for this conference using Flutter.

exhibitions.titleJa: AQAチームによるテスト自動化及びZapier自動化ブース
exhibitions.title: AQA Team Test Automation and Zapier Automation Booth
exhibitions.descriptionJa: メルカリが取り組んでいるモバイルテスト自動化の取り組みや裏側、そして社内で使われている自動化ツール「Zapier」についてご紹介します。
exhibitions.description: Take a behind-the-scenes look at Mercari’s mobile test automation. We’ll also be introducing Zapier, an automation tool used at the company.

exhibitions.title: iOS App Rearchitecture Quiz
exhibitions.descriptionJa: メルカリのJP版メルカリは、iOSチームによりアーキテクチャの大刷新が行われています。 その違いを実際のアプリを通して見比べることができるコンテンツをご用意させていただきましたので、ぜひお楽しみくださいませ！
exhibitions.description: The iOS team is in the process of rehauling the architecture of the Mercari JP app. Experience the changes we are implementing first-hand with a demo using the actual app!

exhibitions.title: Welcome to Mercari US
exhibitions.descriptionJa: Hello, we are Mercari US. 今年リブランドし生まれ変わったUS版メルカリを実際に体験できるコーナーや、US現地のオフィスの雰囲気を知ってもらえるよう、映像やノベルティをご用意してお待ちしております！
exhibitions.description: Hello, we are Mercari US. This year, we rebranded the Mercari US and completely transformed the app. Try out the US version of Mercari at our demo corner and experience the atmosphere of our US office through video and free swags.

exhibitions.title: Days in Mercari Android
exhibitions.descriptionJa: メルカリAndroidチームのエンジニアが実際にどのように機能開発やドキュメンテーションに取り組んでいるかをイメージいただけるような、リアルな開発チームの日常をご紹介します。
exhibitions.description: Learn about the everyday life of engineers on Mercari's Android Team, including the kinds of features we’re developing and the documentation we produce.

exhibitions.titleJa: We are the Machine Learning team!!
exhibitions.title: We are the Machine Learning Team!
exhibitions.descriptionJa: メルカリ機械学習チームの取り組みと我々がどのような問題意識をもって課題解決に取り組んでいるかをご紹介します。
exhibitions.description: Learn about the work of Mercari's Machine Learning Team and the critical thinking we apply in solving challenges with machine learning.

exhibitions.title: Mercari & Microservices
exhibitions.descriptionJa: mercariのMicroservices について、実際に業務を担当しているメンバーからのご紹介とディスカッションの場です。
exhibitions.description: Learn about microservices at Mercari and talk with the team members involved in our project to move to microservices.

exhibitions.title: Research and development organization "R4D"
exhibitions.descriptionJa: メルカリの研究開発組織「R4D」で進めているプロジェクトをご紹介します。また、量子コンピュータを用いたロボットのデモンストレーション（研究開発中）も行う予定です。
exhibitions.description: Learn about R4D, Mercari's research and development organization. There will be demonstrations on robotics using quantum computing (currently undergoing research and development).
